name: Target Acquisition
description: Developing the ability to locate distant or hidden targets through remote viewing techniques.

cards.title: Establishing a Target Connection
cards.description: Techniques to mentally lock onto a target for remote viewing.
cards.bulletpoints: Coordinate Remote Viewing, Sensory Link, Thought Calibration

cards.title: Advanced Target Tracking
cards.description: Using psionic sensory extensions to trace moving or hidden targets.
cards.bulletpoints: Tracking Signatures, Energetic Footprint Analysis, Distance Projection
